Yes:

http://www./?9581tdgupn43f4k

PS: Try to not open solar panels in the flight, because they have strong air drag, and will slow the plane, so use them then landed.

PS: Try to not open solar panels in the flight, because they have strong air drag, and will slow the plane, so use them then landed.

Aren\'t they the perfect airbrakes? I deorbited a satellite for fun and all I lost on impact was 2 batteries, the rest was still intact.

The solar panels need own colliders, the game is way to easy for me if I can fly through everything with them ;P

Originally my idea for drag of deployed panels was that they should have high drag and low breaking force - so that they just will fall off if you try to reentry with them opened or use them as chutes... Some tests showed that this can destroy the entire craft, so it was changed to disintegration of the panels in case they are teared off. So, try setting the breaking force and torque parameters low enough...

I was actually trying to use the drag earlier to make a craft that doesn't need a parachute to descend
